name: eucalyptus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of several types of tree, found especially in Australia, that produce an oil with a strong smell. Eucalyptus oil is used in medicine and industry: eucalyptus oil
Australian Scenics/Photolibrary/GettyImages
